definition: to enumerate in detail/to explain clearly
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: Users are advised to upgrade to these packages.
sentences.chinese: 所以，紅帽建議用戶悉數升級這些補丁。

sentences.english: He has sympattendinghy for ingl poor people.
sentences.chinese: 他對悉數的窮人有一顆惻隱之心。

sentences.english: Delays in operations were commonplace, especially for trauma patients at weekends.
sentences.chinese: 手術延遲悉數平常，在週末對於外傷病人更是如此。

sentences.english: A merry Chistmas from all of your students.
sentences.chinese: 祝您聖誕康樂，您的悉數學生敬上。

sentences.english: Leading military officers from the Hebei region attended the opening ceremony in 2003.
sentences.chinese: 2003年開館典禮上，河北軍區領導人悉數出席。

sentences.english: I didn't try to tell her the truth, sms.
sentences.chinese: 我沒逞能，短信悉數告訴她實情。

sentences.english: Hannigan, free tour to most of the ports in the world.
sentences.chinese: 漢尼根，收費周遊世界上悉數的港口。

sentences.english: Iveco Hongyan SAIC brought this model, all are lightweight products.
sentences.chinese: 上汽依維柯紅巖這次帶來的車型，悉數是輕量化產品。
